title: Server down, but can't leave game at risk of ban?
body: So, the servers went down and I am stuck in game with the whole Trying to Reconnect.. then I found out the servers were going down for three hours for maintenance... but when I try to exit out the game, it states that leaving can result in a temporary ban. What should I do?

replies.body: There was a patch overnight, so there may have been some hiccups while rolling out.  We do try to give as much heads up as possible through our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, so playing matches like ranked during that time is risky.  If you've already had a history of leaves, it's possible that leaving again could lead to a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty.  Hopefully, everything is okay now!
I also ran into this issue, but thought it was a lag spike so closed out the game only to find I couldn't log back in because server is offline :/
